column4: hey guys, im trying to get listen player working. I've installed it using automatix and when I run it I get http://pastebin.ca/171376
if you have any ideas, I would be happy to hear them
The last couple of programs I've tried to run give me the following error: locale.Error: unsupported locale setting
anyone know how I can fix that?
for what it's worth, mine are all "en_US.UTF-8" with a few exceptions
The last couple of programs I've tried to run give me the following error: locale.Error: unsupported locale setting
what does that show for you?
locale: Cannot set LC_ALL to default locale: No such file or directory
